quotes.quote: Bore, n.: A person who talks when you wish him to listen.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: A finished person is a boring person.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: A bore is a man who, when you ask him how he is, tells you.
quotes.author: Bert Leston Taylor

quotes.quote: All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Someone's boring me. I think it's me.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.quote: Every improvement in communication makes the bore more terrible.
quotes.author: Frank Moore Colby

quotes.quote: Good-bye. I am leaving because I am bored.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.quote: A bore is a man who deprives you of solitude without providing you with company.
quotes.author: Gian Vincenzo Gravina

quotes.quote: The capacity of human beings to bore one another seems to be vastly greater than that of any other animal.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: The nice thing about being a celebrity is that when you bore people, they think it's their fault.
quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

quotes.quote: A healthy male adult bore consumes each year one and a half times his own weight in other people's patience.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: The penalty for success is to be bored by the people who used to snub you.
quotes.author: Nancy Astor

quotes.quote: Every hero becomes a bore at last.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The secret of being a bore is to tell everything.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The secret of being boring is to say everything.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote:
Life is as tedious as a twice-told tale
Vexing the dull ear of a drowsy man.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: [S]he refused to be bored chiefly because she wasnï¿½t boring.
quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald
